name: Adventure Mosaics. Moto-Trip
description:
After talking to Ellie, Jake and his loyal companion Zoran set off on a journey!

150 Japanese color crosswords of varying difficulties, a fun summer story, and enchanting music. This upbeat and engaging activity is the perfect way to spend your free time! Seize the opportunity to challenge yourself by solving puzzles in new amazing game Adventure Mosaics - Moto-Trip!

Complete levels, solve puzzles, and help Jake and Zoran as they enjoy the beauty of the world around them!

- 150 memorable and captivating levels!
- spectacular effects!
- embark on an exciting journey!
- enjoy the bright colors of summer!
- train your logical and abstract thinking!
- relax with an easy-to-use interface and captivating gameplay!
